scenario_text.value: Grr... What is this place? Where am I?
Wah! What’s with that guy?!

What’s going on? Is that some sort of
cosplay?

Everyone, stay back! This area is so unstable
that even the inner shrine has collapsed!

Humans?! And so many of them... What’s going
on?!

I was swallowed up by the maelstrom and
then... The Master...did he betray me?!
Aaah! Who is that?! What’s going on?!

Sir? I’m not sure what you’re doing, but
I want you to turn around and come quietly—
Bah! Enough!!!
Uwaaah!!!
Takuma, did you hear that?!

And I know this feeling... Takuma, there’s an
enemy up ahead!

(Damn it! This is just what I hoped wasn’t
happening!)
Takuma, look!
It was Piemon! He’s here in this world!

(Only something’s not right. He’s covered in
wounds, and he looks absolutely furious.)

Oh... Oh no, this is awful! The shrine’s
completely collapsed!
Even the inner shrine must’ve been destroyed.

Huh? The inner shrine? What’s that got to do
with anything?
(Was there something important inside it?)

(But I shouldn’t get distracted. Right now we
need to find a way to deal with Piemon!)

Hey, kids! This place is dangerous! Stay
back!
Grrr! Raaaaaah!
This is bad! Back! Everyone get back!
Yeep!

How can this be?! Master, did I not serve you
well?!
Why is this to be my fate?
Piemon...
Miyuki, stay back! He’s out of his mind!
Piemon, you’re wrong.
Wrong?! How am I wrong?!
Your Master... He’s not what you think.
Do not speak such lies!
(Oh no! Piemon’s going to attack Miyuki!)
(I need to help her, but how?)
Cover for her.
Tell her to run.
Get Agumon to help.
Cover for her.

(If I don’t do something, Miyuki’s done for!
There’s only one thing to do!)
You leave her alone!!!
Takuma? What are you doing?!
Rrk?!
Miyuki! Back off before it’s too late!
All right!

You...filthy human! You would dare strike
me?!

Unforgivable! You’ll pay for that with your
life!
(Well, that’s not good. He’s really mad now!)
Tell her to run.

(I want to save her, but my legs just won’t
move! Damn it! I gotta do something!)
Miyuki! You need to run!
You’re not going anywhere!
Aaaaaah!!!
Hey, watch out!

Oh no! I’m sorry, now you’re hurt, and it’s
all because of me...

It’s...fine. Now stay back! Let me handle
this!
Stay out of this, human!
Uwaaah!
Takuma, what do we do?!
You’re asking me?

(I couldn’t even bring myself to save Miyuki.
What am I supposed to do?)

(Then again, if I don’t do anything, innocent
people are going to be in danger!)
Get Agumon to help.

(I don’t know if I’m strong enough to protect
Miyuki myself, but I know someone who is!)
Agumon, please! You have to protect Miyuki!
You got it, Takuma! I’ll do anything you ask!
Yaaaaaah!
Nnf?!
Miyuki! Over here! Now!
Right!

Grr... Traitorous human lackey... Does your
treachery know no bounds?
You will pay for thwarting me just now!
Please, would you just hear me out?!

I don’t know what you hope to accomplish with
your trickery, but it isn’t going to work!

You’ve got it all wrong! All I want is for
you to listen to me!
Miyuki! Stay back!
But I need to get through to him!

(Does she really think she can convince
Piemon? I don’t think she has much chance.)

I am going to drag you back, and regain my
Master’s favor!

That’s not how it works! That’s what I’ve
been trying to tell you!
More lies!

Believe me, I know! The whole time my soul
was lost, I saw the world as your Master did!
He never cared about you to begin with!

The only thing he does care about is wreaking
vengeance on the world.

And as it stands, you’ve no hope of seeing
your allies again. This isn’t your world.
Lies and deceit! Why should I believe you?

You speak only in falsehoods! Not a word you
say is true!

I will not stand for such blasphemy against
the Master!

(It’s no use. Any more of this will only make
things worse. We have to stop Piemon now!)
Agumon...

On it, Takuma! Ready to fight whenever you
say the word!

I will start by slaughtering these pests, and
then I will return you to the Master, maiden!
Here he comes, Takuma!
Right!

(I don’t see any way around a fight now.
I can save my second thoughts for later.)
Agumon! We’re doing this!
